snippet: With a mild winter in much of the country having tamped down gas demand and with production of natural gas thriving due to the success of hydraulic fracturing technology, "the country is running out of storage space and as a result some producers are...
abstract: With a mild winter in much of the country having tamped down gas demand and with production of natural gas thriving due to the success of hydraulic fracturing technology, "the country is running out of storage space and as a result some producers are slowing down, the Associated Press reports.

headline.main: On Our Radar: Gas, Gas and More Gas
